text: Cougar Town is an American television sitcom. It was first on ABC on September 23, 2009. The show is set in Gulfhaven, Florida (nicknamed "Cougar Town" since its high school teams are the Cougars). The series focuses on a recently divorced woman in her forties. The star is Courteney Cox who plays Jules Cobb. == Awards and nominations == Award Ceremony Year Category Nominee Result Glamour Magazine's Women of the Year Awards 2010 US TV Actress Courteney Cox Golden Derby TV Awards 2010 Outstanding Comedy Series Outstanding Guest Actress in a Comedy Series Lisa Kudrow Outstanding Lead Actress in a Comedy Series Courteney Cox Golden Globe Awards 2009 Best Performance by an Actress in a Television Series â€“ Musical or Comedy People's Choice Awards 2009 Favorite New Comedy Series 2010 Favorite TV Comedy Actress Courteney Cox 2011 Favorite TV Comedy Actress Courteney Cox Critics' Choice Television Awards 2011 Courteney Cox Best Actress in a Comedy Series Best Supporting Actress in a Comedy Series Busy Philipps == References == == Other websites == * Category:2000s American sitcoms Category:2010s American sitcoms Category:Television series set in Florida Category:English-language television programs Category:2009 American television series debuts Category:2015 American television series endings
